title: Meditation — I am Ayurveda
cleaned_text: Meditation During meditation, we awaken the connection to our true nature. The mind-body come together and we naturally turn inward toward a vast space of relaxation. We become detached from our external quests and we gift ourselves the experience of self-observation. There are various ways to meditate; depending on your [dosha](https://www.iam-ayurveda.com/your-dosha-2), you may find it most beneficial to focus on the breath, practice chanting, visualization, eye gazing, or follow a guided meditation.
